website_summaries.verdict: The Incipio Offgrid Express has some design flaws, but get this over the pricier Mophie Juice Pack.
pros: The Incipio Offgrid Express will fully charge the iPhone once and powers up your phone's battery just as well as more expensive chargers
cons: The case has a few inelegant open seams that look unattractive and awkward

customer_reviews.title: Battery cases still not ready for primetime
customer_reviews.text: As expected, a bulky case but more importantly it didn't seem to charge properly. I would leave it plugged in but if the case wasn't turned on it would not charge the case, just the phone. So I found myself without any benefit of having a huge case like this. It's better to just buy an external standalone USB battery pack, and KNOW you will have enough juice for 2-3 complete recharges when you're on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it used a Lightning connector...
customer_reviews.text: It's very effective at addressing the hideous battery life of the iPhone 6 models (I can get through two days of idle use now!) but it's use of a microUSB charging cable means you have to carry an additional cable and woe if you lose it. Update: After about 45 days, the case simply refused to charge. Contacted Incipio; no joy. Disappointing -- it's a nicely designed device, but it could use two changes: better quality control, and the ability to switch the case off to preserve the battery charge. Due to the charging problem, I've had to abandon the device.
customer_reviews.author: David Boyes

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but be careful of the charge button
customer_reviews.text: Charges iPhone quickly and can get almost two charges in. Great case, but be careful of the charge button. Very delicate little button that can easily fall off during the installation process. Good after installation, but care must be taken.
customer_reviews.author: Stickvader

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery Poor Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this battery case. It arrived quickly and in an unopened retail package. It charged just as described but the outer ring used to lock the phone into the battery is pretty flimsy. After removing it twice the button in the lower right side, used to turn the battery on and check for level, popped off and I couldn't find it. I promptly returned it for a full refund. I doubt I will purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Two and a half days of charge

customer_reviews.title: Not good for protection
customer_reviews.text: It manages to charge my iphone about twice when the case is fully charged. I accidentally dropped the case from a height of 4 feet and the thing snapped apart and lunged my phone. Beware, the case is very fragile and easy to break when removing the framing portion. The frame has already broken for me a month and a half after owning this. I give this 3 stars because the battery portion functions well, but the overall assembly design and protection for your phone is severely lacking. I would try another brand first.
